rows.label: qev035101_MSG0001
rows.name:
You seem strong for Earth alien.
Maybe strong enough to withstand...his training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I have been looking for fiercest of warriors.
Are you stronger than beast?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0010
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim you're the strongest BLADE in the land.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0020
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0021
rows.name: Murmur a negative reply.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah! I knew from one look!
I can tell true warrior by glint of [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] fangs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Mmm. Then we are done speaking.
This job is death to all but finest of fighters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0005
rows.name:
His is uncommon strength. Coward who calls [ST:gender p1=himself p2=herself ]
weak can only expect painful demise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0006
rows.name:
You may well prove match for Odsent.
Will you spar with suid under my command?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Odsent

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0031
rows.name: Inquire about this "Odsent" character.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Commanding

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0041
rows.name:
Inquire about what the Prone means
by "commanding" an indigen.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0007
rows.name:
To defeat enemy, first know enemy.
This is wisdom of seasoned warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0008
rows.name:
I came here to tame fearsome suid.
I worked many suns. Bent him to my will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0009
rows.name: It was long journey. Difficult. But finally, I am master![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0010
rows.name:
He is my fiercest servant. Fulfiller of my dreams.
He is Odsent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Odsent must grow strong. For this he needs combat.
I ask that you spar with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0012
rows.name: Have you never faced Prone beastmaster in battle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Then luck is with you! Tree Clan masters wild beasts.
Uses them as living weapons to destroy our foes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0014
rows.name:
We train our beast servants daily.
Push their abilities far past those of feral kin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0015
rows.name:
You are warrior. Yet even you would struggle to defeat
well-trained beast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0016
rows.name: Odsent is my servant. I would have you spar with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0017
rows.name:
He has potential. But it is hidden deep inside.
I hope combat will unleash it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0018
rows.name:
I have dream. But first Odsent must grow stronger.
Will you aid me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0019
rows.name:
You are great help! This is best done in open space.
I will send Odsent to cape on Janpath Lake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0020
rows.name: Show Odsent full force of your strength there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Battle him as you would any feral beast.
Only by cheating death can he learn to fight for life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0022
rows.name:
Odsent is no coward. He should not flee.
But if he does, inform me at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0023
rows.name: May your strength make Odsent great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0024
rows.name:
I will send Odsent to cape on Janpath Lake in
Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Heh heh. You will find him to be no common beast.
Take fight lightly, and it will be your last.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0026
rows.name: You live! How was it? Did you find my Odsent strong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0051
rows.name: Admit that the beast was a mighty foe.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0060
rows.name: Laugh

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0061
rows.name:
Boast that the beast posed no challenge
to one as mighty as you.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Of course. Because of all beasts in Mira,
he was one I chose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0028
rows.name: ...Wait. He fled? Toward mountains?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Mmm. Perhaps he needs more experience to face
warrior of your skill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0030
rows.name:
I will train him. One day he will overpower even you!
But for now, he needs easier prey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0031
rows.name: ...What? He fled? Toward mountains?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0032
rows.name:
But...I commanded him to fight to end.
My mastery over him is incomplete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0033
rows.name: This is dire news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0034
rows.name: I have another request, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0035
rows.name:
I fear Odsent may break his mental training.
Return to feral state.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0036
rows.name:
He could attack any who climb northern mountains.
BLADEs. Prone. Other alien foragers. All are fair game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0037
rows.name:
I can bring him back to heel. But I need white iron
sand and noranlilies. Will you bring them to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0038
rows.name: This time, he will yield to my will. I swear it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0039
rows.name: Prone use incense to tame beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0040
rows.name:
White iron sand and noranlilies make potent one.
Please hurry, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Have you found what I need? We must hurry.
Someone will be hurt soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0042
rows.name: That is it! They will make powerful training incense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0043
rows.name: Now we must track down Odsent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0074
rows.name: He may be feral. If so, he will be nesting in cave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0044
rows.name:
Will you help me search caves around northern
mountains? If I search alone, it takes time.
Lives may be lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0045
rows.name:
This is for dream I have held since childhood.
Please lend me your aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Zarch about his dream.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0080
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0081
rows.name: Promise to help Zarch.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0046
rows.name:
Long tales must wait until Odsent is found.
Besides, it is dream that cannot be without him.
To tell it now is meaningless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0047
rows.name:
But is has to do with Odsent name.
In old Prone tongue, it means "he who opens future."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0048
rows.name:
I have no path forward without Odsent.
Please help me find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0049
rows.name: It is good that I met you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0050
rows.name:
Odsent is my most powerful servant.
His name means "he who opens future."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0051
rows.name:
My future is lost without him. And my dream.
You must help me find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0052
rows.name:
Curse his bones! Why would chieftain stand in way
of my dream?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0090
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Zarch what happened.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0100
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0101
rows.name: Tell Zarch that revenge won't accomplish anything.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0053
rows.name: Oh! Hello, friend. Will you hear my troubles?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Our chieftain is Sevvy Belgazus.
He forbids conflict with Cavern Clan in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0055
rows.name: Rrrgh! Weakling! Coward! Pacifist![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0056
rows.name:
Our chieftain, Sevvy Belgazus, thinks as you do.
He refuses to meet Cavern Clan in battle.
Where has pride of Tree Clan gone?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0057
rows.name:
At last I have power to fight. But he demands I hold!
Watch our oppressors live in comfort![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0058
rows.name:
Cavern scum captured my family. Killed my mother.
What of her memory?! Her honor?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0059
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0060
rows.name:
...Forgive me, Earth alien. I owe you debt.
And Prone always settle debts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0061
rows.name:
Thanks to you, I still have my Odsent.
But chieftain's orders are absolute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0062
rows.name:
Someday I will leave New LA. And on that day,
I will kill all Cavern scum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0063
rows.name: ...You killed Odsent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0064
rows.name:
Nothing matters now. My dream is shattered.
By your hand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0065
rows.name:
Life holds no meaning. Kill me if you wish.
Just as Cavern Clan cut down my mother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0110
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0111
rows.name: Make clear your murderous intent.

rows.label: qev035101_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev035101_SEL0121
rows.name: Explain that you are not siding with the Cavern Clan.

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0066
rows.name: ...You really mean to do it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0067
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0068
rows.name: P-please. I am not ready to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0069
rows.name:
Take this. Just leave me to live in shame.
At least then my dream will still remain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0070
rows.name: Hollow words![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0071
rows.name: ...But I do thank you for finding Odsent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0072
rows.name:
Prone repay debts. Both to enemy and friend.
Here. Take this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035101_MSG0073
rows.name: Now go. Stand in my way no longer.[ST:wait ]
